about_the_game:
Pawnbarian is a card-flinging rogue-like puzzler, in which you use chess moves to hack and slash through hordes of enemies.​ It's very easy to pick up, but hard to master.

You'll have to carefully plan your moves, make use of various effects, and strategize around all sorts of enemy traits.

This demo contains a single character, and a single dungeon.
